meanings.sent1: The old house was unfortified against the strong winds, so it shook easily.
meanings.sent2: The unfortified door was easily pushed open by the intruder.
meanings.sent3: The unfortified sandcastle crumbled as soon as the wave touched it.
meanings.sent4: Her unfortified heart was vulnerable to his sweet words.
meanings.sent5: The unfortified bridge collapsed under the weight of the heavy truck.

meanings.definition: Not having added alcohol or other spirits
meanings.sent1: She preferred unfortified wine because she didn't like the taste of alcohol.
meanings.sent2: The unfortified juice was safe for the kids to drink.
meanings.sent3: The unfortified punch was a hit at the party, even without alcohol.
meanings.sent4: His unfortified cocktail was refreshing on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: The unfortified beer was a popular choice among the designated drivers.
